channel.description:
**Inspired by Pug’s** **[color = green]Siege on Xed Gamemode[/color]** **[color = ligblue] Blue Dragon [/color]**= **[color =gold] Yellow Phoenix [/color]** **[color = purple] Unseen [/color]**= **[color = darkslategray] Xeniss’ Conquerers [/color]** **[color = red] Cult [/color]** = **[color = darkgreen] Council of the Snake [/color]** **[color = darkgray] Neutrals [/color]**= **[color = gray] Nomads of Rian [/color]**
I'm accepting the fact this is be over **[color = gold] 1[/color]** **[color = darkslategray]0[/color]** **[color = darkgreen]0[/color]** edits... thats a lot for a single post.
> ## [color = red] So What’s Different?[/color] >**New Setting** -The Setting takes place in a Tribal Village. >**Changed Classes** -Each class is changed a bit to have the old feel, but still be a bit different. >**New Antagonist Factions** At some point, you’re going to get bored of the Cult and the Unseen. So, here is the Xeniss’ Conquerers and The Council of the Snakes. >**Pray Ability** -A new System that occupies you for the night, since you are praying to the gods for extended power. Every day a player can choose to Pray or not, starting on Day 2. You will have to pray 3 times if you are Yellow Pheonix, 2 times if you are a Conquerer or a Council Member, if you are a non-nomadic killer, and you only have to kill people if you are Nomadic Killer. (just started, might take a week or 2, I have 227 abilities to buff) You also are able to buff all 4 abilities if you are a Nomadic Killer, 3 abilities if you are a Non-Nomadic Killer, 2 if you are a Conquerer or Council Member, and 1 if you are Yellow Phoenix. Also your points will last through conversions.
[details="Yellow Phoenix"] > ## [color = gold] The Dream Caster [/color] > **[color = gold] Yellow Phoenix Offensive [/color]** > **Insomnia (Passive)** - Immune to Occupation and target changing. >**Overdose (Day)** -Make the Chief go into eternal rest, killing him. If they were a Light Chief, you will commit suicide the next night. **Buff:** if the Chief is a Light Chief, you will commit suicide instead, and the chief will live. 1 Use. >**Cast Dream (Night)** Make someone sleep, occupying them for the night. **Buff:** The next night, your target will be given accurate results. Infinite Uses. >**Dreamworld (Night)** Make a mist around you, redirecting all your visitors to them selves. **Buff:** You will lose the redirection to themselves, however, if you were killed, the court will see who visited you. 2 Uses. _Your objective is to defeat the Conquerers or the Council, and any Nomads that seek to do you harm._ >**Converts into [color = darkslategrey] The Ordeal [/color] or the [color = darkgreen] Copperhead [/color]**
> ## [color = gold] The Magus [/color] > **[color = gold] Yellow Phoenix Support[/color]** >**Dummy (Night)** -Summon a doll to protect your chosen target. if any player casts a negative effect on your target, that isn't a kill, their action will appear to have gone through, but in reality, it won't have. Infinite Uses. **Buff:** Can Block Kills, however, if it successfully does, Dummy will be on cooldown for 1 night. >**Disappear (Night)** - Redirect all visitors from a chosen target to another player. Cannot Target Self. 4 uses. **Buff:** Can Target Self now. _Your objective is to defeat the Conquerers or the Council, and any Nomads that seek to do you harm._ >**Converts into [color = darkslategray] The Warlock [/color] or [color = darkgreen] The Python[/color]**
> ## [color = gold] The Gatherer [/color] > **[color = gold] Yellow Phoenix Offensive [/color]** >**Beloved (Passive)** -You can step up for Chief elections before the rest. > **Busy (Passive)** - Immune to Occupation and target changing. >**Accompany(Night)** Make another person target you, making you death immune to any attacks or conversions you redirect. Infinite Uses. **Buff:** you are able to redirect a player to another player. Same Uses. >**Forage(Night)** Give a person another use of their limited use abilities. Not usable on prince who executed YP. 3 Uses. **Buff:** Can give prince who exes YP, but it will consume 2 Uses of this ability. if you only have 1 use left, you will not be able to use it. _Your objective is to defeat the Conquerers or the Council, and any Nomads that seek to do you harm._ >**Converts into [color = darkslategrey] The Thief [/color] or [color = darkgreen] The Copperhead [/color]**
> ## [color = gold] The Hawker [/color] > **[color = gold] Yellow Phoenix Killer [/color]** > **Noctural(Passive)** - Immune to Occupation and target changing. >**Banzai Rush(Night)** Tell your Hawk to attack someone, making them bleed to death in 2 nights. 3 Uses. **Buff:** Reduces Time to 1 night. >**Watchful(Night)** See who visits you tonight. 4 Uses **Buff:** you will also hide from anyone doing negative affects, except kills. _Your objective is to defeat the Conquerers or the Council, and any Nomads that seek to do you harm._ >**Converts into [color = darkslategrey] The Beastmaster [/color] or [color = darkgreen] The Black Mamba [/color]**

Infinite Uses **Buff:** You will Attack your attacker as well, but will be occupied, bypassing occupy immunity next night. Charges also get reduced to 4 Uses. >**Attack(Night)** Attack someone at Night. If they are YP, you will lose access to this ability. 3 Uses. **Buff** You will be occupied instead of attacking if you attack YP. you will not know. _Your objective is to defeat the Conquerers or the Council, and any Nomads that seek to do you harm._ >**Converts into [color = darkslategrey] The Praetorian [/color] or [color = darkgreen] The Black Mamba [/color]**

item.title: New Gamemode Suggestion(War of the Tribes)
item.dc:creator: Lightsin
item.description:
Inspired by Pug’s Siege on Xed Gamemode
Blue Dragon = Yellow Phoenix
Unseen = Xeniss’ Conquerers
Cult = Council of the Snake
Neutrals = Nomads of Rian

I’m accepting the fact this is be over 1 0 0 edits… thats a lot for a single post.

So What’s Different?

New Setting -The Setting takes place in a Tribal Village.
Changed Classes -Each class is changed a bit to have the old feel, but still be a bit different.
New Antagonist Factions At some point, you’re going to get bored of the Cult and the Unseen. So, here is the Xeniss’ Conquerers and The Council of the Snakes.
Pray Ability -A new System that occupies you for the night, since you are praying to the gods for extended power. Every day a player can choose to Pray or not, starting on Day 2. You will have to pray 3 times if you are Yellow Pheonix, 2 times if you are a Conquerer or a Council Member, if you are a non-nomadic killer, and you only have to kill people if you are Nomadic Killer. (just started, might take a week or 2, I have 227 abilities to buff) You also are able to buff all 4 abilities if you are a Nomadic Killer, 3 abilities if you are a Non-Nomadic Killer, 2 if you are a Conquerer or Council Member, and 1 if you are Yellow Phoenix. Also your points will last through conversions.

Yellow Phoenix

The Dream Caster

Yellow Phoenix Offensive
Insomnia (Passive) - Immune to Occupation and target changing.
Overdose (Day) -Make the Chief go into eternal rest, killing him. If they were a Light Chief, you will commit suicide the next night. Buff: if the Chief is a Light Chief, you will commit suicide instead, and the chief will live. 1 Use.
Cast Dream (Night) Make someone sleep, occupying them for the night. Buff: The next night, your target will be given accurate results. Infinite Uses.
Dreamworld (Night) Make a mist around you, redirecting all your visitors to them selves. Buff: You will lose the redirection to themselves, however, if you were killed, the court will see who visited you. 2 Uses.
Your objective is to defeat the Conquerers or the Council, and any Nomads that seek to do you harm.
Converts into The Ordeal or the Copperhead

The Magus

Yellow Phoenix Support
Dummy (Night) -Summon a doll to protect your chosen target. if any player casts a negative effect on your target, that isn’t a kill, their action will appear to have gone through, but in reality, it won’t have. Infinite Uses. Buff: Can Block Kills, however, if it successfully does, Dummy will be on cooldown for 1 night.
Disappear (Night) - Redirect all visitors from a chosen target to another player. Cannot Target Self. 4 uses. Buff: Can Target Self now.
Your objective is to defeat the Conquerers or the Council, and any Nomads that seek to do you harm.
Converts into The Warlock or The Python

The Gatherer

Yellow Phoenix Offensive
Beloved (Passive) -You can step up for Chief elections before the rest.
Busy (Passive) - Immune to Occupation and target changing.
Accompany(Night) Make another person target you, making you death immune to any attacks or conversions you redirect. Infinite Uses. Buff: you are able to redirect a player to another player. Same Uses.
Forage(Night) Give a person another use of their limited use abilities. Not usable on prince who executed YP. 3 Uses. Buff: Can give prince who exes YP, but it will consume 2 Uses of this ability. if you only have 1 use left, you will not be able to use it.
Your objective is to defeat the Conquerers or the Council, and any Nomads that seek to do you harm.
Converts into The Thief or The Copperhead

The Hawker

Yellow Phoenix Killer
Noctural(Passive) - Immune to Occupation and target changing.
Banzai Rush(Night) Tell your Hawk to attack someone, making them bleed to death in 2 nights. 3 Uses. Buff: Reduces Time to 1 night.
Watchful(Night) See who visits you tonight. 4 Uses Buff: you will also hide from anyone doing negative affects, except kills.
Your objective is to defeat the Conquerers or the Council, and any Nomads that seek to do you harm.
Converts into The Beastmaster or The Black Mamba

The Warrior

Yellow Phoenix Killer
Guard (Night) Guard someone at Night, making them death immune. Infinite Uses Buff: You will Attack your attacker as well, but will be occupied, bypassing occupy immunity next night. Charges also get reduced to 4 Uses.
Attack(Night) Attack someone at Night. If they are YP, you will lose access to this ability. 3 Uses. Buff You will be occupied instead of attacking if you attack YP. you will not know.
Your objective is to defeat the Conquerers or the Council, and any Nomads that seek to do you harm.
Converts into The Praetorian or The Black Mamba

The Spirit

Yellow Phoenix Social
Tongues of the Dead(Passive) You can communicate with the dead at night.
Calls of Madness (Day) -The target player will not be able to vote for the next hour, and the vote cap to put someone on trial will be dropped by 1. 3 Uses. Buff: The voting increases to 1 IRL day.
Echoes of the Wind(Night) -All Day abilities used will be shown to the entire court tomorrow. 3 Uses. Buff: Only shows you the abilities used, but you also see what abilities target you tonight.
Evolve(Night) -Allow 2 players to send 2 1000-character messages to each other. 2 Uses. Buff: You can send 2 1000-character message as well.
Your objective is to defeat the Conquerers or the Council, and any Nomads that seek to do you harm.
Converts into The Phantom or The Pipe Snake

The Totem Holder

Yellow Phoenix Social
Totem of Cloning(Day)-your vote during the Judgement Phase will count as 2. Unlimited uses. Buff: your vote during the day will count as 2.
Totem of Seeing(Night) -See what classes visits your target. Buff: can’t see classes anymore, but sees who visits targets.
Totem of Guarding(Night) See who targets your target with day abilities tomorrow. If they target a person, they will be prevented from voting for the rest of the day. Buff: They will also be occupied tonight(not bypassing occupation immunity)
Your objective is to defeat the Conquerers or the Council, and any Nomads that seek to do you harm.
Converts into The Crest Storer or The Pipe Snake

The Holy Man

Yellow Phoenix Investigative
Tongues of the Spirits(Day)-See if your target is a member of the Council, if they’re not, you will receive their class type. 1 use. Buff: after using this, you will also know if a Council Member visits you for the next 2 nights.
Dissection(Night) -See if a target is a member of the Council. Infinite Uses. Buff: You Will know the target’s faction.
Justice(Night) Choose a target. If they are a member of the Council, you will attack them. If they are a Nomad, they will be occupied. If they are YP, you will be occupied instead. 2 Uses. Buff: This ability will bypass death/occupation immunity on everything.
Your objective is to defeat the Conquerers or the Council, and any Nomads that seek to do you harm.
Converts into The Scarlet Kingsnake

The Bird

Yellow Phoenix Investigative
Follow(Day)-Set your bird to follow someone. If they attack someone, you will be notified. Only works for this night, 3 Uses. Buff: See who your target visits as well.
Watch(Night) -See if your target left his room. Infinite Uses. Buff: See who they visit.
Stake-Out(Night) See who visits your target. 3 Uses.Buff: See what classes visited your target as well, however, will be randomized. drops uses to 2.
Your objective is to defeat the Conquerers or the Council, and any Nomads that seek to do you harm.
Converts into The Raven or The Scarlet Kingsnake

The Healer

Yellow Phoenix Support
Supplies(Passive) -When you are first attacked, you will heal yourself, but will be occupied. You are also immune to Bleeding and Venom.
Heal (Night) - heal the chosen target. Saves targets from Attacks, Venom, and Bleeding. Infinite Uses. Buff: Can only heal from Venom/Bleeding, however, makes target immune to the same status effect for the next 2 days.
Consult Spirits (Night) -Gain another use of your passive, Making you Death, Occupy, and Redirect immune due you being in the Spirit world. 1 Use. Buff: Makes you prevented to visits.
Your objective is to defeat the Conquerers or the Council, and any Nomads that seek to do you harm.
Converts into The Witch Doctor or The Python

The Warchief

Yellow Phoenix Killer
Just War, kiddo.(Passive) - Immune to Occupation and target changing.
Confine(Day) Choose a target’s to jail tonight. Infinite uses. Buff: You can choose to jail yourself, preventing all visits to yourself.
Fire in the Hole(Night) Execute your prisoner. If they are YP, you will lose your executes. 3 Uses. Buff: you will now be silenced for the next day if you execute BD, except on Trial, but you will keep your uses.
Your objective is to defeat the Conquerers or the Council, and any Nomads that seek to do you harm.
Immune to Conversion

The Diplomat

Yellow Phoenix Investigative
Beloved(Passive) - You may step up before the other people for Chief elections
Barter(Night) -Recieve 2 class type stuff from your target. 1 will be false, while the other will be true. Infinite Uses. Buff: You will receive someone’s exact class type.
Foreign Negotiations(Night) -Leave the Castle for 1 day, making yourself not able to speak or vote tomorrow, but making all visitors prevented the next night. 1 Use. Buff: You will be able to speak and vote, however, you will still be prevented tonight.
Your objective is to defeat the Conquerers or the Council, and any Nomads that seek to do you harm.
Converts into Scammer or The Scarlet Kingsnake

The Lookout

Yellow Phoenix Investigative
Vigilante(Day) -If the court does not vote up your target, you will attack them at the end of the night. 1 Use. Buff: Your attack will bypass death immunity, except on Nomadic Killers, in which case you will be occupied.
Conquering(Night) - Check if a player is a member of the Xeniss’ Conquerers. Infinite Uses. Buff: Also See the target’s alignment if they’re Not Sus(says YP on Warlord)
Spy(Night) -See who the Conquerers visit tonight. 2 Uses. Buff: only see if the unseen visited you, but also see the abilities they used on you.
Your objective is to defeat the Conquerers and any Nomads that seek to do you harm.
Converts into The Warden

Xeniss' Conquerers

The Thief

Conquerer Offensive
Beloved (Passive) -You can step up for Chief elections before the rest.
Busy (Passive) - Immune to Occupation and target changing.
Steal(Night) Make another person target you, making you death immune to any attacks or conversions you redirect. Infinite Uses.
Search(Night) Give the Guerilla another use of Threat.
Your objective is to defeat the Yellow Phoenix and any Nomads that seek to do you harm.

The Guerilla

Conquerer Killer
Threat (Day) - Make your Visits not appear to any Classes. 2 Uses.
Revolt(Day) Make your next attack bypass death immunity, and make your self not able to be occupied. 2 Uses.
Murder(Night) Attack someone. Infinite Uses.
Viva La Revolución!(Night) Choose 2 people you will murder. You will kill yourself along with those 2 people. 1 Use.
(Abilities are refreshed for Guerillas after the 1st one)
Your objective is to defeat the Yellow Phoenix and any Nomads that seek to do you harm.

The Crest Storer

Conquerer Social
Crest of Copying(Day)-your vote during the Judgement Phase will count as 2. Unlimited uses.
Crest of Watching(Night) -See who visits your target.
Crest of Sabotaging(Night) See who targets your target with day abilities tomorrow. If they target your person, they will Be prevented from voting for the rest of the day.
Your objective is to defeat the Yellow Phoenix and any Nomads that seek to do you harm.

The Scammer

Conquerer Investigative
Beloved(Passive) - You may step up before the other people for Chief elections
Scam(Night) -Receive your target’s class type. infinite Uses
Deal(Night) - Make the current Guerilla Immune to death tonight, and leave the Castle for 1 day, making yourself not able to speak or vote tomorrow, but making all visitors prevented the next night. 1 Use.
Your objective is to defeat the Yellow Phoenix and any Nomads that seek to do you harm.

The Preatorian

Conquerer Support
Watch(Night) -Stand Guard on a Conquerer Member, redirecting all negative effects, including kills, to yourself.
Follow(Night) -If the Guerrilla is occupied, you will complete their action, excluding Viva La Revolución!.
Your objective is to defeat the Yellow Phoenix and any Nomads that seek to do you harm.

The Witch Doctor

Conquerer Offensive
Supplies(Passive) -When you are First attacked, you will heal yourself. You are also immune to Bleeding.
Expose Strain(Day) -Make a person they are are Bleeding. On the 2nd night they will believe they were healed. 3 Uses.
Cleanse(Night) -Remove a Player’s journal, clearing it. 2 Uses.
Poison(Night) -Poison a player, making them think they were attacked and healed. Infinite Uses.
Your objective is to defeat the Yellow Phoenix and any Nomads that seek to do you harm.

The Phantom

Conquerer Social
Grave Whispers(Passive) -While you are a Phantom, the dead Xeniss’ conquerers may speak to the other faction members at night.
Scream(Day)-Prevent a Player from voting for the rest of the day. 3 Uses.
Oversleep(Night) -The target player will not be able to vote for the first 1/3 of the day. Infinite Uses.
Voices Of the Mad(Night)-If you’re target were to use a postive ability on your target, they will be redirected to your Warlord. If they were to do a negative afftect, they will target the Chief. If they’re were to use an investigative ability, they will be occupied. They will not be told who they were redirected to. 4 Uses
Your objective is to defeat the Yellow Phoenix and any Nomads that seek to do you harm.

The Warden

Conquerer Investigative
Check(Day) - See the Current Chief’s alignment at the end of this night. 2 Uses.
Monitor(Night) -See which classes visit your target. Infinite Uses.
Overwatch(Night) -See who the target class visits. 3 Uses.(Similar Grid to Facelift)
Your objective is to defeat the Yellow Phoenix and any Nomads that seek to do you harm.

The Warlord

Conquerer Special
Illusion(Passive) -Immune to death, occupation, and target changing. Occupiers will think it succeeded.
Religious(Passive) -attend Phoenix teachings for the first 3 nights, making investigative classes think you are Yellow Phoenix.
Throwing Knife(Day) Make someone Bleed. They will die in 2 nights, unless cured. Bypasses death immunity.
Soul Exchange(Day) -Have you and the Guerilla swap classes at the start of the next day. 1 Use. (In case YP finds Warlord d2/3, And they’ll Wait till d4.)
Conquer(Night) -Convert someone into the Xeniss’ Conquerers Faction. Infinite Uses, 1 Day Cooldown.
Your objective is to defeat the Yellow Phoenix and any Nomads that seek to do you harm.

The Raven

Conquerer Investigative
Stalk(Day) -set your raven to follow someone. If they visit an investigative class, you will be notified.
Stare(Night) -See if your target left his room. Infinite Uses.
Crime Scene Investigation(Night) See who visits your target, and who visited them the night before.
Your objective is to defeat the Yellow Phoenix and any Nomads that seek to do you harm.

The Beastmaster

Conquerer Offensive
Nocturnal(Passive) - Immune to Occupation and redirection at night.
Brawl(Night)-Attack a player, making them target you. 2 Uses.
Lion(Night)-Set a Lion at your Target’s door, occupying them and prevent all visits except for Xeniss’ Conquerers members. 3 Uses.
Your objective is to defeat the Yellow Phoenix and any Nomads that seek to do you harm.

The Warlock

Conquerer Support
Bone Wall(Night)- Prevent all visits to someone except for Conquerer members, and occupying them. If you use it on a Conquerer, they will not be occupied. If used on yourself, no one can visit you.
Reanimate(Night)-Use a Dead person’s ability on someone. 3 Uses.

The Ordeal

Conquerer Offensive
Insomnia (Passive) - Immune to Occupation and target changing.
Cast Nightmare(Night) Make someone sleep, occupying them for the night. Infinite Uses.
Horrorland(Night) Make a mist around you, redirecting all your visitors to them selves.
Your objective is to defeat the Yellow Phoenix and any Nomads that seek to do you harm.

The Experimenter

Conquerer Support
Armory(Passive) -Immune to Venom/Bleeding, and immune to death once.
Lower Plane Projection(Night) -The target conquerer member will be immune to visits, and healed tonight, also curing any Venom/Bleeding. 3 Uses.
Apprentice(Night) -If the Mastermind tries to convert tonight, you will follow them. If the conversion is successful, they will be healed, If not, You will make them believe they were attacked and healed. 3 Uses.
Your objective is to defeat the Yellow Phoenix and any Nomads that seek to do you harm.

The Black Cat

Conquerer Offensive
Cackle(Passive) -If you are executed for treason, everyone will be occupied, bypassing occupy immunity, except for Conquerer Members.
Frighten(Passive) Immune to occupation and redirection at night.
Meow(Night) -Make the target player target you instead. Infinite Uses.
Trail(Night) -Any Investigators that try to check the Conquerer members tonight will be redirected to you instead. 2 Uses.
Your objective is to be executed at day.

The Stormguard

Conquerer Support
Contract(Passive) Immune to occupation and redirection at night.
Priority(Passive) If your target is converted when you are Guerrilla, you will become the Stormguard again, and your target will become the Guerrilla.
Xeniss’ Care(Day) Revive your target this night. 1 Use.
Deny(Night) Prevent all visits to your target. 4 Uses.
Spy(Night) -See who visits your target. Infinite Uses.
Your objective is to have your target converted and win.
(If they can’t be converted, then you will just have to have the unseen win, and your target will be changed to a manually chosen unseen member).

The Detested

Conquerer Offensive
Disgusting(Passive) Immune to Occupation and redirection. Your occupiers will think you aren’t occupy immune.
Glob(Day) -Make a person not able to vote today, and have them not count to the majority. Infinite Uses.
Follow(Night) -See who your target visits. Infinite Uses.
Your objective is to defeat the Yellow Phoenix and any Nomads that seek to do you harm.

The Affluential

Conquerer Investigative
Xeniss’s Seeker(Passive) -Immune to death once.
Seek(Night) -See a player’s Class Type. Infinite Uses.
Interrogate(Night) -See if your target is the Sorcerer. 2 Uses.
Your objective is to defeat the Yellow Phoenix and any Nomads that seek to do you harm.

Council of the Snake

The Black Mamba

Council Offensive
Martyr(Day) -Sacrifice yourself tonight to make the Cobra’s Strike ability bypass Death immunity for 2 nights… 1 Use. Buff: it will bypass Healing instead, and won’t be counted as a visit.
Scale Wall(Night) -Make a player immune to visits tonight, 3 Uses. Buff: Players using Night abilities on their person will believe their ability went through.
**
Your objective is to defeat the Yellow Phoenix and any Nomads that seek to do you harm.

The Pipe Snake

Council Social
Snake Tongue(Passive) The Council can speak to Dead Council members at night, unless they were Roared or Transported.
Hiss(Day) Make a player vote for another player. 4 Uses. Buff:
Snake in a box!(Night) The target person will not be able to vote for the first 1/3 of the day, due to them playing their flute for you. Buff: Increases to 3/4 of the day.
Stare(Night) Watch a player. If someone were to use a night ability on them tonight, they will be silenced for the first 1/3 of the day. Buff:
Your objective is to defeat the Yellow Phoenix and any Nomads that seek to do you harm.

The Cobra

Council Special
Prudence(Day) See if your target can be converted or not, giving the results at the start of the night. 3 Uses.
Marked(Day) if the target player gets executed, you will gain 2 uses of Sacrifice. 4 Uses.
Bite(Night) -convert your target to a member of the Council of the Snakes. Infinite uses, 1 day cooldown.
Sacrifice(Night)-Kill 2 Players tonight. 4 Uses.
Your objective is to defeat the Yellow Phoenix and any Nomads that seek to do you harm.

The Copperhead

Council Offensive
Cold-Blooded(Passive) -Immune tin occupation and redirecroom at night.
Sabotage(Day) -Prevent the Warchief from tying up anyone today. 1 Use.
Hiss(Night) -Prevent anyone from visiting your target. Infinite Uses.
Coil(Night) -Occupy your target, bypassing occupy immunity. 2 Uses.
Your objective is to defeat the Yellow Phoenix and any Nomads that seek to do you harm.

The Python

Council Support
Last Breath(Passive) -If you are killed at night, the Black Mamba’s Strike will bypass death immunity tonight and tomorrow night.
Shed(Night) -Swap 2 people’s faction results.
Snake’s Kindness(Night) -Heal the Entire Council tonight.
Your objective is to defeat the Yellow Phoenix and any Nomads that seek to do you harm.

The Scarlet Kingsnake

Council Investigative
Trail(Night) -See who the target player visits, and who visits them. Infinite Uses.
Warrant(Night) -See what your target’s class is. 3 Uses.
Your objective is to defeat the Yellow Phoenix and any Nomads that seek to do you harm.

Nomads of Rian

The Brewer

Nomadic Support
Cache(Passive) You are Immune to Venom and Bleeding.
Double-Edged Sword(Night) -Occupy a player, healing them, and curing Venom/Bleeding If they are. Buff: removes occupation.
Astral Projection(Night) -Make a Target Immune to visits tonight. 2 Uses. Buff: Make yourself immune to visits as well.
Your Objective is to Survive until the end of the game.

The Fox

Nomadic Social
Guilt(Passive) If you are executed for treason, the court will not able to use any night abilities the next night.
Hide(Passive) Immune to Occupation and Redirection at night.
Annoy(Day) Decrease the vote count to you by 1 does not show, and does not work if you are not voted up first. 2 Uses. Buff: Increases to 2.
Burrow(Night) Prevent anyone from visiting you tonight. 3 Uses. Buff: You will prevent all negative affects, including kills.
Follow(Night) Visit the target player. Infinite Uses. Buff: Your target will be told they were be attacked and healed.
Your objective is to be executed for treason.

The Pathfinder

Nomadic Investigative
(Passive) Immune to Death and Conversion once. Also Immune to Occupation
Loyalties(Night) -See if a target player is neutral or not. Infinite Uses. Buff: see if someone is a Killer/Offensive class.
Grudge(Night) -Attack a player at night. Bypasses the Occultist’s death immunity. 2 Uses.Buff: Bypasses all Death Immunity now.
Your objective is to live to see the Occultist die.

The Legionnaire

Nomadic Support
Eye on the Prize(Passive) - Immune to occupation and target changing at night.
Scorned(Passive) - after 2 nights without use of Second Chance, your win condition will turn into making sure your target’s faction wins. If you step up as king, you will turn into either the Light, Renegade, or Snake chief. (if you don’t use second chance.) if your target was a Nomad, you will tasked to survive.
Worth It(Day) -If your target were to be attacked, you will kill the attacker and be killed yourself. 2 Uses. Buff: You will not die.
We are the Legion(Day) Guard your target, making yourself immune to death and making them immune to all visits. 3 Uses. Does not give message. If they were however to die, you will save them. You will also be occupied. Buff: removes occupation.
Second Chance(Night) -turn your win condition into a brewer’s one. your abilities will be disabled, you will be immune to conversion, but will turn into the Fainthearted chief if you turn into a chief. Buff: You will also be immune to death.
Messenger Bird(Night) -See the names of everyone who visits your target. 3 Uses. Buff: also makes your target death immune
Your objective is to have your target survive.

The Demon

Nomadic Killer
Flame Shield(Passive) -Immune to occupation, target changing, death, and bleeding.
Necronomicon(Day) -Change your next target’s logs. these will replace them. Infinite Uses, can be used infinitely during the day. Buff: You will also receive your old targets logs.
Remask(Day) -Change your next target’s class. Infinite Uses, can be used infinitely during the day. Buff: You can disguise as another class after a kill. Lasts for 1 night.
Transport(Night) -Attack your target. Their class and logs will be the ones you chose them to be. Infinite Uses. Buff: You can use your day abilities at night as well.
Ritual(Night) -Choose a dead neutral at night. If they lost, you will be able to bring them back as a Ghost. 1 Use. Buff: adds another use.
Your objective is to eliminate the main factions.

The Ghost

Nomadic Support
Transparent(Passive) -You will not be able to speak and vote at day, however, you may use day abilities. You are also untargetable by night and day abilities.
Serve Thy Master(Passive) -You will meet the Demon at night, and can speak to him there. If the demon were to die, you will re-die, but staying as the ghost.
Wail(Day) -Make the Demon immune to visits tonight. 2 Uses. Buff: A target person voting the Demon will lose their vote. does not show in Vote Count and to them.
Empower(Night) -The Demon’s next use of Transport will bypass death immunity. 2 Uses. Buff: It will also make the Demon occupy his target.
Stairway to Tarnation(Night) -The next person affected by Transport will die, yet will be not be announced to the court. Buff: if the person was a neutral, they will become a ghost, if there already isn’t 2 ghosts.
Your objective is to have the Demon Win.

The Jaguar’s Spawn

Nomadic Killer
Hierarchy(Passive) -If you die, another Jaguar will take your place. Your mind will inhabit theirs, however.
Pack Leader(Day) -Summon 2 Jaguars to prevent all visits to you tonight. Uses 2 Jaguars, 2 Uses. Buff: They will also attack 1 random person, eating everything on them. Court will not know their class.
